column1: Visitation will be held on Tuesday
column3: 2015 from 2:00 P.M. to 9:00 P.M. with a Prayer Service at 7:00 P.M. in the Hillcrest Chapel. Procession will depart Hillcrest on Wednesday
column5: 2015 following a 9:30 A.M. Chapel Service for interment at Wildflower Memorial Park Cemetery.(10392 Kriewald Rd.
